Material used.Description: Antibody was used to detect α-synuclein in cell cultures.

Readout description.Result Description: α-synuclein immunoprecipitation and staining showed increased aggregation in cells with the variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Four biological replicates were performed to ensure reproducibility.
